description:
A bonus episode separated into three parts. In the first part (scene takes place in between episode 9 and 10), taking place before the characters reach Ostia, Ai and the others visit a hot spring. In the second part (scene takes place after in the middle of episode 9), Alice remembers the times he has killed his classmates and he encounters Hampnie Hambart, and a battle ensures. In the third and final part (scene takes place after near end of episode 2), Hampnie dreams of when he first met Hana, and he is then woken up by Ai.
Source: Wikipedia
